title: $:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01
name: Slant 01
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/info": { "title": "$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/info", "created": "20160714085429897", "modified": "20160714085430957", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "text": "show" }, "$:/core/ui/TagTemplate": { "title": "$:/core/ui/TagTemplate", "created": "20150409155917643", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043939642", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui todo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-innerXXX(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB) <$set name="foregroundColor" value=<>> <$set name="backgroundColor" value="""$colour$"""> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tag-label" style=<>> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
<$list filter="[all[current]tagging[]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
\end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB) <$set name="foregroundColor" value=<>> <$set name="backgroundColor" value="""$colour$"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tag-label" style=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="visible"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="$:/wikilabs/ui/TiddlerInfo/TagMap"/> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$view field="title" format="text" /> \end \define tag-body(colour,palette) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/> \end <$macrocall $name="tag-body" colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}}/> " }, "$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo": { "title": "$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo", "created": "20160715044326535", "modified": "20160715044332225", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$macrocall $name="tabs-state" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfo]!has[draft.of]]" state=<> default={{$:/config/TiddlerInfo/Default}}/>" }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate", "created": "20150409114928087", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715042927845", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define wikilabsInfo() $:/state/info/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define wikilabsInfoTabState() $:/state/infotab/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define frame-classes() tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-view-frame $(missingTiddlerClass)$ $(shadowTiddlerClass)$ $(systemTiddlerClass)$ $(tiddlerTagClasses)$ $(userClass)$ \end \define folded-state() $:/state/folded/$(currentTiddler)$ \end <$set name="storyTiddler" value=<>><$set name="tiddlerInfoState" value=<> ><$set name="tiddlerInfoTabState" value=<> ><$tiddler tiddler=<>>
>><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
" }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/controls": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/controls", "created": "20150409111025527", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043114993", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define config-title() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end \whitespace trim
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
" }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/info": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/info", "created": "20150409112822850", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043115035", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate $:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo"/> " }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle", "created": "20150409110006642", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043115032", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": " <$link to={{!!modifier}}> <$view field="modifier"/> <$view field="modified" format="relativedate"/> " }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags", "created": "20150409111725996", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043115028", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate $:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
<$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>
" }, "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title": { "title": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title", "created": "20150409104855705", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043115022", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate $:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \whitespace trim
<$set name="foregroundColor" value={{!!color}}> >> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$view field="title"/> {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle}}
{{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/controls}}
" }, "$:/tags/ViewTemplate": { "title": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "created": "20150409110757827", "creator": "pmario", "list": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/info $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/classic $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body", "modified": "20160715043115016", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "" }, "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/Stylesheet": { "title": "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/Stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".wltc-tiddler-title .tc-titlebar{ position: absolute; font-size: 1.1em; } .wltc-tiddler-title { overflow: hidden; } .wltc-tiddler-title .tc-subtitle { font-size: 0.7em; } .tc-tiddler-controls { font-size: 2.5em } .tc-tiddler-controls button svg { vertical-align: top; } .tc-tags-wrapper { padding-top: 2px; margin-top: -1em; } .tc-tiddler-body { border-top: thin solid lightgray; } .tc-tiddler-info { padding-right: 12px; } .clearfix:after { content: ""; display: table; clear: both; }" }, "$:/wikilabs/macros/tabs-state": { "title": "$:/wikilabs/macros/tabs-state", "created": "20150410121547232", "creator": "pmario", "modified": "20160715043722780", "modifier": "pmario", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro $:/wikilabs/ui", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define tabs-state(tabsList,default,state:"$:/state/tab",class,template)
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"> <$button set=<> setTo=<> default="$default$" selectedClass="tc-tab-selected"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"> <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/>
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default="$default$"> <$transclude tiddler="$template$" mode="block"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
\end " }, "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/license": { "title": "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/license", "text": "Slant-01 Theme (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2018 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/" }, "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/readme": { "title": "$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/readme", "text": "! Overview This is an opinonated theme, used by pmario. !!! License CC-BY-NC-SA - {{$:/themes/wikilabs/slant-01/license}}" } } }
